message_1: A train starts from station A at 10:00 AM and reaches station B at 1:30 PM. What is the time duration of the train journey in hours and minutes?
message_2:
The train starts at 10:00 AM and reaches station B at 1:30 PM. To find the time duration of the journey, we need to subtract the starting time from the arrival time.

Starting time: 10:00 AM
Arrival time: 1:30 PM

First, we need to convert the times to a 24-hour format:
Starting time: 10:00 (10:00 AM)
Arrival time: 13:30 (1:30 PM)

Now, subtract the starting time from the arrival time:

Hours: 13 - 10 = 3 hours
Minutes: 30 - 0 = 30 minutes

So, the time duration of the train journey is 3 hours and 30 minutes.
